events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a full refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been classified under the Refund category based on the customer's request for money back.
The refund case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. for further handling and resolution.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to request a refund due to receiving the wrong item.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process the refund quickly?
My order number is 123456789. I have attached a photo showing the incorrect product that was sent instead.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and provide you with a prepaid return label for the incorrect item.
Thanks for the prompt response. I appreciate the quick refund and return label offer.
The refund has been processed, and the return label emailed to you. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and if everything is satisfactory with this resolution.
As we have not heard back, we are closing this refund case. Please contact us again if you need further help.
